SEARCH
Package com.github.oeuvres.alix.fr

Class TagFilter

java.lang.Object
com.github.oeuvres.alix.fr.TagFilter
public class TagFilter extends Object
A vector of 256 boolean positions to record different flags.

  • Method Details

    • cardinality

      public int cardinality()
      Count of flags set to true, like BitSet.cardinality().
      Returns:
      count of flags = true.

    • cardinality

      public int cardinality(TagFilter include, TagFilter exclude)
      Count of flags set to true. If include is not null, include.get(flag) should be true. If exclude is not null, exclude.get(flag) should be false. This method is used to test a subset of flags.
      Parameters:
      include - if not null, count flags in this set only.
      exclude - if not null, do not count flags in this set.
      Returns:
      Σ(flag==true)

      Returns:

      Throws:
      IndexOutOfBoundsException - position outside [0, 255].
      UnsupportedOperationException - vector is frozen, modification is forbidden.

    • clearGroup

      public TagFilter clearGroup(Tag tag) throws IndexOutOfBoundsException, UnsupportedOperationException
      Clear the hexa group of a byte. For example flag=0x43 will set to false the positions [0x40, 0x4F].
      Parameters:
      tag - position by name Tag.flag in the group to clear.
      Returns:
      this
      Throws:
      IndexOutOfBoundsException - position outside [0, 255].
      UnsupportedOperationException - vector is frozen, modification is forbidden.
